scripts.start-template: pnpm run localnode && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && obelisk faucet --network localnet && obelisk publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && next
scripts.world-publsih-localnet: obelisk publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-publsih-devnet: obelisk publish --network devnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-publsih-testnet: obelisk publish --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-publsih-mainnet: obelisk publish --network mainnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
scripts.world-upgrade-localnet: obelisk upgrade --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-upgrade-devnet: obelisk upgrade --network devnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-upgrade-testnet: obelisk upgrade --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-upgrade-mainnet: obelisk upgrade --network mainnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
